raw_json.main_html:
R Blogs

Posted on December 17, 2009 by Ralph in R bloggers | 0 Comments

[This article was first published on Software for Exploratory Data Analysis and Statistical Modelling, and kindly contributed to R-bloggers]. (You can report issue about the content on this page here)
Want to share your content on R-bloggers? click here if you have a blog, or here if you don't.

There are many blogs on Statistics, R and other related topics scattered around the internet. The R bloggers website provides a central hub where feeds from participating blogs are collated so that they can be viewed from a single website.

This resources certainly appears to be a good idea so that people can more easily identify blogs with information about the use of the R statistical software system.

Related

To leave a comment for the author, please follow the link and comment on their blog: Software for Exploratory Data Analysis and Statistical Modelling.
R-bloggers.com offers daily e-mail updates about R news and tutorials about learning R and many other topics. Click here if you're looking to post or find an R/data-science job.
Want to share your content on R-bloggers? click here if you have a blog, or here if you don't.
